content: That sounds like a great plan! I think a 9-foot diameter rug in a neutral color like beige or gray will work really well with my new velvet sofa set. I'll definitely consider the undertone and pile height of the rug to ensure it complements the sofa nicely. By the way, do you have any recommendations for some good online stores or websites where I can find a rug that fits my criteria? I'd like to browse through some options and read reviews before making a purchase.
